summary: This document contains the operating agreement and articles of organization for Southern Financial, LLC, a limited liability company formed in the U.S. Virgin Islands. Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the managing member and initial manager of the company, which is authorized to conduct lawful business in the territory. This document is an account agreement between Southern Financial LLC and Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. It outlines the terms and conditions governing the brokerage account, including client representations, rights of the bank, trading restrictions, and arbitration clauses. The document also includes disclosures regarding margin accounts and tax responsibilities.
